properties.entry:
SELECT pc.llbh, pc.llfl, pc.szrq, pc.llbl, pc.status, pc.ztms, pc.usernum, (CASE WHEN pc.activate=1 THEN '启用' else '未启用' END) activate FROM csb_ll pc where 1=1
{? AND pc.llbh = #llbh#} {? AND pc.llfl = #llfl#} {? AND pc.activate = #activate#}
UPDATE csb_ll pc SET pc.ACTIVATE = 1 WHERE pc.llbh = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hbdx_user where userphnoe=?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hbdx_user huser WHERE 1=1 AND huser.userphnoe <> ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM yhdx_dl where dljhm=?
select count(*) from hbdx_user where username=?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hbdx_user huser left join yhdx_dl dl on dl.dldxbh=huser.dldxbhfk WHERE huser.yhdxdh = ? AND huser.userjhm <> ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hbdx_user huser WHERE 1=1 AND huser.username <> ?

SELECT hbuser.yhdxdh, yd.dldxbh, yd.dljhm, yd.tgslj, hbuser.username, hbuser.userjhm,
hbuser.crje, hbuser.hbgs, hbuser.everyoneTotal, (hbuser.aggreatMount+hbuser.crje) as aggreatMount, lv.status, hbuser.userphnoe, lv.llfl as yhjb, hbuser. email
FROM hbdx_user hbuser
left join yhdx_dl yd on yd.dldxbh=hbuser.dldxbhfk LEFT JOIN csb_ll lv on lv.llbh=hbllfk where 1=1 {? AND yd.dljhm = #dljhm#} {? AND hbuser.yhdxdh = #yhdxdh#} {? and hbuser.userphnoe=#userphnoe#} {? and lv.activate=#activate#} {? AND USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#USERNAME#),'%') ESCAPE '/'}

SELECT hbuser.yhdxdh, hbuser.username, hbuser.crje, hbuser.crje*(select llbl from csb_ll where llfl='收益利率')*0.7 as rsy, hbuser.crje*(select llbl from csb_ll where llfl='收益利率')*0.3 as hbjj, lv.status, hbuser.userphnoe, lv.llfl as yhjb, (hbuser.aggreatMount+hbuser.crje) as aggreatMount, mx.qsrq,mx.jsrq FROM hbdx_user hbuser left join yhdx_dl yd on yd.dldxbh=hbuser.dldxbhfk left join hbdx_symx mx on mx.yhdxdhfk=hbuser.yhdxdh LEFT JOIN csb_ll lv on lv.llbh=hbllfk where 1=1 and hbuser.usernum='0' {? AND hbuser.yhdxdh = #yhdxdh#} {? and hbuser.userphnoe=#userphnoe#} {? and lv.activate=#activate#} {? AND USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#USERNAME#),'%') ESCAPE '/'}
select dldxbh from yhdx_dl where 1=1 {? AND dljhm=#dljhm#}

update hbdx_user hbuser set hbuser.dldxbhfk=#dldxbhfk#, hbuser.tgslj=#tgslj# where 1=1
{? AND hbuser.userjhm = #userjhm#}
select dl.tgslj from yhdx_dl dl where 1=1{? AND dl.dljhm = #dljhm#}
update hbdx_user hbuser set hbuser.usernum=#usernum# where 1=1 {? AND hbuser.yhdxdh=#yhdxdh#}
select hbuser.yhdxdh from hbdx_user hbuser where 1=1 {? AND hbuser.userjhm=#userjhm#}
select llfl from hbdx_user where yhdhfk=?
select password from hbdx_user hbuser where 1=1 {? and hbuser.userphnoe=#userphnoe#}
select count(1) from hbdx_user hbuser where 1=1 {? and hbuser.userphnoe=#userphnoe#}
select hbuser.yhdxdh from hbdx_user hbuser where 1=1 {? and hbuser.userphnoe=#userphnoe#}
select users.password from hbdx_user users where 1=1 {? and users.yhdxdh=#yhdxdh#}
select users.crje*(select llbl from csb_ll where llfl='收益利率')*0.7 from hbdx_user users where 1=1 {? and users.yhdxdh=#yhdxdh#}
select count(*) from hbdx_user users where 1=1 {? and users.parentid=#parentid#}
select lv.llbl from csb_ll lv where 1=1 {? and lv.usernum=#usernum#}
